name: Yumeka
description:
!! Trigger Warning !! : Sexual harassment + Suicide

The player will navigate Yumeka's dreams.

This game is a point and click so just use your mouse to interact with objects as well as moving the character.

The game was created in the environment of the LvlUp game jam and the theme was from dream to nightmare by the team NullPointerException.

Known issues:
-Doors are difficult to open
-The character might pass under some visual assets
-There's a cutscene where the stage doesn't show right away but we see the characters.
-While viewing an item, we can get stuck on the viewing screen and move around
   ->If this happens, just go through a door if possible
- The light might go over some items while the player's viewing them
- When you come back to the classroom, the beginning cutscene replays

The constraints we followed were retro and story driven.
